remarks: Perform a cyclical shift for a word.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-May-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 17-Nov-2018.)
statement: cshword $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift N ) = ( ( W substr <. ( N mod ( # ` W ) ) , ( # ` W ) >. ) ++ ( W substr <. 0 , ( N mod ( # ` W ) ) >. ) ) ) $.
